wordpress.when: Tyger Shark Inc. - Fall 2014
wordpress.about: Fun site for Bauer's First Shift program. This was a first shot at practicing a degree of modular CSS. Dig the design and photos too.

wordpress.when: Tyger Shark Inc. - Fall 2014
wordpress.about: Clean site for Barrie RVH's physician recruitment. Had the pleasure of implementing the registration process using Gravity Forms, with pdfs sent out upon submission. They dug it!

wordpress.when: Tyger Shark Inc. - Fall 2014
wordpress.about: Cool site for a special flags manufacturer. It was a challenge laying out the wealth of content -- text, images, everything.

wordpress.when: Tyger Shark Inc. - Winter 2014
wordpress.about: It's the hot summertime now, but I was there for the winter site. It was my first shot at animating svg!

apps.about: This is like Tinder but you have to swipe right on shrubs, grasses, and mosses.
Simple CRUD page made w/ the MEAN stack. Cool visuals.
Collaboration with friend & colleague Slevin Zhang. They're synced post-its with todo lists.
